entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as reacting to the sudden appearance of something vast and glittering in the sky. He gasps and springs to his feet again, staring up at it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as initially thinking that the vast and glittering thing is another leprechaun formation, but then realizes it's a colossal skull. He watches as it rises higher and higher in the sky.

entities.name: skull
entities.description: The skull is described as being comprised of emerald stars with a serpent protruding from its mouth like a tongue. It blazes in a haze of greenish smoke, etched against the black sky like a new constellation.

entities.name: serpent
entities.description: The serpent is described as protruding from the skull's mouth like a tongue.

relationships.description: Ron reacts to the appearance of the skull in the sky, gasping and staring up at it.
Harry realizes that the vast and glittering thing is a colossal skull, comprised of emerald stars with a serpent protruding from its mouth.
